data.name: Recall: Empty Wishes Demo
data.short_description: Ever since Tommy disappeared, Yonny, her sister, has being trying to locate him. By way of a toy handset once shared with Tommy, Yonny and her friend gained access to a world constructed from past memories, along with its inhabitants’ most private thoughts and the truth of Tommy’s disappearance...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 | AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
